name: Hummus Pasta
description: If you're looking for a super quick and easy pasta dish, this hummus pasta is perfect for you! It's vegan, ready in just 10 minutes, and packed with flavor!

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package.

recipeInstructions.text: In the meantime, roast the pine nuts in a large pan without oil. Be careful as they burn rather quickly.
recipeInstructions.name: In the meantime, roast the pine nuts in a large pan without oil. Be careful as they burn rather quickly.

recipeInstructions.text: Then, heat some oil in the same pan. Add the garlic and cook for about 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Then, heat some oil in the same pan. Add the garlic and cook for about 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the sun-dried tomatoes into slices. Wash the baby spinach. Add both to the garlic and cook for another 2 minutes or until the spinach wilts.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the sun-dried tomatoes into slices. Wash the baby spinach. Add both to the garlic and cook for another 2 minutes or until the spinach wilts.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cooked pasta. Stir in the hummus and season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Sprinkle with chopped basil. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cooked pasta. Stir in the hummus and season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Sprinkle with chopped basil. Enjoy!
